import {HttpClient} from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit{ empleados:any; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { }; ngOnInit(): void { } title = 'angular7'; }
